pageContent: Background: There are several effective treatments for prostate cancer. To what extent a patient's functional status influences the treatment decision is unknown. This study examined the association between functional status and treatment among older men with prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Re: Recovery of Baseline Erectile Function in Men following Radical Prostatectomy for High-Risk Prostate Cancer: A Prospective Analysis Using Validated Measures
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27628822/
